data.name: Counter Chaos Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Counter Chaos demo contains basic features to get you started on your beginner entrepreneurial adventures.

This demo lets you serve customers, pack boxes, buy products, sort shelves, and arrange a small store.

As they say: if you want something done right, do it yourself.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The Counter Chaos Demo shows you the very basics of having a store.
